title: Senior Data Engineer
description: We are looking for an experienced Data Engineer to join our team. You will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining high-quality software solutions. Experience with Python, JavaScript, and cloud platforms required.

title: Data Engineer
description: Join our growing team as a Data Engineer. You will work on cutting-edge projects using the latest technologies. Required skills include Python, TypeScript, React, and experience with AWS or Azure cloud services.

title: Junior Data Engineer
description: Great opportunity for a Data Engineer with 1-3 years of experience. You will collaborate with senior developers on web applications and services. Knowledge of Python, Django, and modern JavaScript frameworks is a plus.
